org.jboss.resteasy.auth.oauth

Class OAuthToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.resteasy.auth.oauth.OAuthToken
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAuthRequestToken

    public class OAuthToken
extends Object
    Represents either an OAuth Access or Request Token.
    Author:
    Stéphane Épardaud
